title: Pixel 6a likely won’t support Google Camera’s Motion Mode
content:
Google introduced a new camera mode with the release of the Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro, called Motion Mode. The feature captures multiple photos at once and combines them with machine learning to add a motion blur to the background. However, that functionality might be missing from the upcoming Pixel 6a. We’ve seen a

The post Pixel 6a likely won’t support Google Camera’s Motion Mode appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Google Pixel 6a might not support one of the newer camera features found on the Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro.
